name: Movie Marathon
description:
Catch the runaway reel and put a stop to those pesky movie monsters!
A film reel is running away in Stoke City! Who else is suited for the job except the trusty cinema clerks at the local Cineplanet? Make a break for it and rack up a huge score along the way.

Controls:
Spacebar - Torch attack
WASD or arrow keys - Move left and right

Team 777 are:
